description: This file defines the main layout component for a note-taking application, managing state for notes, selected note, and editor visibility. It integrates with authentication and notes API functions, and orchestrates the rendering of Sidebar, TopBar, NotesList, and NoteEditor components.

methods.name: NotesLayout
methods.description: Main React functional component that manages the layout and state of the notes application, including fetching notes, handling note selection, addition, deletion, and editing.
